column3: hom nka hom ano nto mu wɔ m’enyim; na aman nnu hɔn ahoɔdzen mu fofor: wɔntwe mbɛn; na wɔnkasa: hom mma yɛmbɔ mu nhyia asɛndzii."

column2: "Woana na ɔwosoow obi fi boka no
column3: woana na konyimdzi dzi n’ekyir wɔ beebiara no? Ɔdze amanaman dzi n’enyim
column4: na ɔma odzi ahemfo do tum; ɔdze hɔn ma n’afona dɛ huntuma
column5: dɛ mburonan a wɔbɔ no kɔ ma n’egyen."

column3: na otwa mu sen sɔnn; wɔ ɔkwan a n’anan nnsii do da mu mpo."

column2: "Woana na ɔayɛ na oedzi dɛm dwuma yi
column3: dɛ ɔrefrɛfrɛ mbasantsen fir ahyɛse yi? Emi mara EWURADZE a
na wosuroi; asaase ewiei ho popoe: wɔtwee bɛnee

column2: "Wɔkɔr hɔn ho mboa nkorkor; na obiara kaa kyerɛɛ no nua dɛ
column3: Hyɛ akokodur."
na nyia ɔdze hamɛr siesiee ho no yɛɛ nyia ɔbor tombo do dɛmara
column4: ɔreka wɔ ɔsɔw no ho dɛ
column5: Oye: na ɔdze mprɛgow bobɔɔ mu dzen amma oenntutu."

column3: Israel
column5: Jakob a masan mu meyi wo

column2: "Ɔwo a mifi asaase ano noho mesuo wo mu
column3: na mifi ne mfɛndzanan mafrɛ wo aba
column6: masan mu meyi wo na monntoow wo nnkyenee."

column3: na menye wo nam; mma w’akoma nntu
column4: na emi nye wo Nyankopɔn: mebɛhyɛ wo dzen; nyew
column6: medze me ndzeyɛtsenenee abanyimfa bosuo wo mu egyina."

column3: hɔn a woenya wo ho ebufuw nyinara bɛfɛr na hɔn enyim egu ase: hɔn a wɔnye wo fimfen nyinara bɛyɛ gyan
naaso innkohu hɔn
column4: mekyerɛ hɔn a wɔnye wo dzi aper no a: hɔn a wotu wo do ɔsa no bɛyɛ gyan

column2: "Na emi mara EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn na medze wo nsa nyimfa mu
column3: na mese wo dɛ
ɔwo abowaba Jakob
column6: na wo pomfo nye Israel Krɔnkrɔnnyi no."

column3: mebɛyɛ wo ɔporowdadze fofor ndam ndam a ɔwɔ se pii: ebɔporow mbepɔw na ayam hɔn wekowekoweko
na mframa asoa hɔn akɔ
column4: na ekyinehyia mframa abɔ hɔn apetse: na ɔwo dze ibedzi EWURADZE mu ehurusi
column5: ebɛhyehyɛ woho wɔ Israel Krɔnkrɔnnyi no mu."

column2: "Abɔbɔfo na ehiafo hwehwɛ nsu naaso bi nnyi hɔ
column3: na nsukɔm ntsi
column4: hɔn tɛkyerɛma do wow; emi EWURADZE mara na mubobua hɔn

column3: na nsunyiwa wɔ mbɔnsa finimfin: mebɛma sar ayɛ nsutaae
akeesia
column5: na ngodua wɔ sar do; medze kupresi na ɔsɛsɛw na ɔpapaa dua bɔbɔ mu esisi sar pradada do:"

column3: na woeehu
column6: dɛ EWURADZE ne nsa na ɔayɛ iyi
column7: na Israel Krɔnkrɔnnyi no na ɔabɔ."

column3: EWURADZE na ɔse; hom mbɔ hom nkurow a ɔyɛ dzen biara
na wɔmbɛkyerɛ hɛn dza obesi: hom nda adadadze no edzi
column6: na yeehu hɔn ewiei; anaadɛ hom nkyerɛ hɛn ndzɛmba a ɔreba."

column2: "Hom nda ndzɛmba a daakye ɔbɛba edzi ma yenhu dɛ hom yɛ abosom: nyew
column3: hom nyɛ biribi papa
hom fi adze gyangyan mu
column4: na hom ndwuma so yɛ adze gyan: ekyiwadze nye nyia ɔsan mu yi hom."

column3: na ɔaba; obi a ɔbɔ me dzin fitsi wipuei a: na ɔbɛba ambradofo do dɛ oritsia dɛtse do
column4: na dɛ ɔwemfo ritsia awendɛtse do."

column2: "Woana na ɔada no edzi fir ahyɛse
column3: ama yeehu? Ɔnye kankantsetse no
column6: obi nnyi hɔ a ɔda no edzi
column7: na obi nnyi hɔ a ɔkyerɛ
column9: obiara nnyi hɔ a otsie hom nsɛm."

column2: "Emi na mibedzi kan mase Zion dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column4: hwɛ hɔn; na mebɛma Jerusalɛm obi a ɔdze nsɛmpa ba."

column3: nyimpa bi nnyi hɔ; hɔn mu ɔpamfo bi nnyi hɔ a
column4: sɛ mibisa hɔn ho asɛm a

column3: hɔn nyinara yɛ egyangyandze: na hɔn ndwuma yɛ adzehun hɔn ehonyi a woegu no yɛ mframa na enyimguase."
